sentences.sContent: There were mainly foreigners living there, so we could chat with them now and again.
sentences.sCn: 那里进进出出都是外国人, 我们可以时不时和他们搭讪聊天.

sentences.sContent: So venture out of your comfort zone now and again, and rediscover how good discomfort can feel.
sentences.sCn: 所以，时不时地跳出舒适的领域，重新去发现不适的感觉其实是多么美好。
